Package org.dellroad.dataskin.ops

Interface Query<C,R>

Type Parameters:
C - configuration type for this query
R - result type for this query
All Superinterfaces:
Operation<C,Stream<R>>
All Known Subinterfaces:
InstanceQuery<T,C,R>, StaticQuery<C,R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInstanceQuery, AbstractQuery, AbstractStaticQuery
public interface Query<C,R> extends Operation<C,Stream<R>>
Read-only data access operation that returns a stream of result items.

Result items can themselves be targets for both static and instance operations according to getStaticOperations() and getInstanceOperations() (respectively).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.dellroad.dataskin.ops.Operation

    Operation.Handle<C,R>, Operation.Progress

  • Method Details

    • getResultItemType

      default com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken<R> getResultItemType()
      Get the item type returned by this query with the given config.

      The implementation in Query uses reflection to resolve the generic type parameter <R>.

      Returns:
      query item result type
